alert.note: Alert for De Kalb; Lee; Ogle (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 23 at 5:35AM CDT until July 23 at 6:00AM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 AM CDT FOR EASTERN OGLE...EASTERN LEE AND DE KALB COUNTIES... At 533 AM CDT, an area of rain behind earlier thunderstorms was producing severe wind gusts. Rochelle recently gusted to 58 mph in these showers with occasional lightning. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Surface observations. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... DeKalb, Sycamore, Rochelle, Sandwich, Genoa, Shabbona, Cortland, Davis Junction, Hinckley, Somonauk, Kirkland, Waterman, Hillcrest, Maple Park, Kingston, Malta, Paw Paw, Creston, Lindenwood and Monroe Center. This includes... Northern Illinois University and Sandwich Fairgrounds. Including the following interstates... I-39 between mile markers 78 and 114. I-88 between mile markers 69 and 101. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
